properties.description:
In short:
1) First delivery:
  >file name:  KIOSK-GF-GA-FIG_Extract.csv.gz
  >save to: app2145sqldev; 
under sub-directory, named YYYYMMDD
  >Format: csv
  >Compress: GZip
=========================
2) Second delivery:
 >file name:  KIOSK-GF-GA-FIG_Extract.csv
>save to: app0094sqldev
 at root directory
>Format: csv, 
>Compress: No 
=========================
3) Third Delivery:
 >file name:  KIOSK-GF-GA-FIG_Extract-YYYYMMDD-HHMM.csv
>save to: app0094sqldev
 at sub-directory archive
>Format: csv, 
>Compress: No 
=========================
for memory: 
#1105604 -> Destination & FileName
#1123260 -> linked services
#1080216 -> file Type & FileName
#1080214 -> schema

body.value:
{
    "message" : "Hi there, \nThe dumping from HANA failed.@{concat('\nThanks,','\n\n',pipeline().DataFactory,  '\n',formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcNow(),'Eastern Standard Time'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mmtt')    )}",
    "to": "@{pipeline().parameters.receiver}" ,
    "cc": "@{pipeline().parameters.cc}" ,
    "bcc": "@{pipeline().parameters.bcc}" ,
    "subject" : "No-Reply from Automation: The Data dumping from HANA failed."
}

activities.name: Extract From HANA
activities.description:
Directly query to extract from HANA;
Sink to App0094sqldev/global-audit

source.query:
--Version 4.5
--	Update column names
--		FIRM_ID  as Geography_ID
--		FIRM_DESC  as  Geography_Description  
--		GEOGRAPHY as Member_Firm
--		GEOGRAPHY_DESC as Member_Firm_Description
--	Added where clause to filter NULLS in Levels 
--		where Levels is not NULL
--Verion 4.3
--	Updated control table entr: "Financial Summary" dashboard entry would be replaced with "Extended Reporting"

--IMPORTANT POINTS FOR DEPLOYMENT
	--On Line 433, a where clause "Fiscal_Year = 2022" is added to prevent exposure of FY21 data to receiving side. (As per requested by Sid J.) 
	--Line 433 to be taken off, when PY23 data becomes available in FIG-side, and control table has entry for FY23.



--using different parameters than query in dev
with hours_Hana as 
(SELECT 
		 FUNCTION,
		 FUNCTION_DESC,
		 SRVC_LN_GRP,
		 SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC,
		 SERV_ID,
		 SRVC_LN_DESC,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER 
			ELSE FIRM_ID 
		 END as FIRM_ID,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER_DESC 
			ELSE FIRM_DESC 
		 END AS FIRM_DESC,
		 GEOGRAPHY,
		 GEOGRAPHY_DESC,
		 VTYPE,
		 VALUE_TYPE_DESC,
		 FYEAR,  
		 FPER,
		 FPER_DESC,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER_DESC,
		 ACCOUNT_ID,
		 ACCOUNT_DESC,						
		 sum(QNTY) AS QNTY  
 FROM "_SYS_BIC"."FIG.REPORTING.BI/CV_PL_RECON_RC" 
  ('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_REP_CUR$$', 'USD'),
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_VAL_PUB_INP$$', 'Validation'),
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_EXCHANGE_TYPE$$', 'F'),  
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_DB_IND$$', 'KA')) as a
 JOIN "_SYS_BIC"."FIG.SHARED_OBJECTS/CV_DIM_VALUE_TYPE" as b
 on B.VALUE_TYPE = A.VTYPE
-- ACCOUNT IDS FOR HOURS DATA
  WHERE ACCOUNT_ID IN ('4981','4982','4983','4984','4985','4986','4987','4988','4989') 
  AND FUNCTION = 10 
  AND VTYPE in (10,50)
  AND SERV_ID != 102010
  AND FYEAR >= (SELECT 
				FYEAR - 1
 				FROM "FIG_DS_SCHEMA"."FIG.FIGR_OVERHAUL::FIG_CTL_TBL.DASHBOARD"
				WHERE VAL_PUB = 'Publish'
				AND DASHBOARD_NAME = 'Financial Summary')
GROUP BY 	 
		 FUNCTION,
		 FUNCTION_DESC,
		 SRVC_LN_GRP,
		 SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC,
		 SERV_ID,
		 SRVC_LN_DESC,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER 
			ELSE FIRM_ID 
		 END,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER_DESC 
			ELSE FIRM_DESC 
		 END,
	     GEOGRAPHY,
	     GEOGRAPHY_DESC,
		 VTYPE,
		 VALUE_TYPE_DESC,
		 FYEAR,  
		 FPER,
		 FPER_DESC,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER_DESC,
		 ACCOUNT_ID,
		 ACCOUNT_DESC

),
----------------------------------------
-- hours_data
----------------------------------------
hours_data as (
select
   FUNCTION  as Business_ID
  ,FUNCTION_DESC  as Business_Description
  ,SRVC_LN_GRP  as Sub_Function_ID
  ,SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC   as Sub_Function_Description
  ,SERV_ID as  Service_Line_ID
  ,SRVC_LN_DESC  as Service_Line_Description
  ,FIRM_ID  as Geography_ID
  ,FIRM_DESC  as  Geography_Description  
  ,GEOGRAPHY as Member_Firm
  ,GEOGRAPHY_DESC as Member_Firm_Description
  ,VTYPE as Value_Type
  ,VALUE_TYPE_DESC as Value_Type_Desc
  ,FYEAR  as Fiscal_Year
  ,FPER as Fiscal_Period
  ,FPER_DESC as Fiscal_Period_DESC
  --,ACCOUNT_DESC as Levels
  ,CASE
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4984' THEN 'Senior Manager'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4987' THEN 'Staff'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4982' THEN 'Salaried Partner'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4988' THEN 'Analyst/Junior Staff'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4985' THEN 'Manager'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4983' THEN 'Director'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4986' THEN 'Senior Staff'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4981' THEN 'Partner'
  END as Levels
--  ,'Hours' as Measure_Type
  ,QNTY AS HR_Quantity
  ,NULL as HC_Quantity

  from hours_Hana
),
---------------------------------------
--  headcount_HANA 
---------------------------------------
headcount_HANA AS
(
SELECT 
		 FUNCTION,
		 FUNCTION_DESC,
		 SRVC_LN_GRP,
		 SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC,
		 SERV_ID,
		 SRVC_LN_DESC,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER 
			ELSE FIRM_ID 
		 END AS FIRM_ID,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER_DESC 
			ELSE FIRM_DESC 
		 END AS FIRM_DESC,
	     GEOGRAPHY,
	     GEOGRAPHY_DESC,
		 VTYPE,
		 VALUE_TYPE_DESC,
		 FYEAR,  
		 FPER,
		 FPER_DESC,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER_DESC,
		 ACCOUNT_ID,
		 ACCOUNT_DESC,
 		 sum(QNTY) AS QNTY  
 FROM "_SYS_BIC"."FIG.REPORTING.BI/CV_PL_RECON_RC" 
  ('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_REP_CUR$$', 'USD'),
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_VAL_PUB_INP$$', 'Validation'),
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_EXCHANGE_TYPE$$', 'F'),  
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_DB_IND$$', 'KA')) as a
 JOIN "_SYS_BIC"."FIG.SHARED_OBJECTS/CV_DIM_VALUE_TYPE" as b
 on B.VALUE_TYPE = A.VTYPE
-- ACCOUNT IDS FOR HEADCOUNTS DATA
  WHERE ACCOUNT_ID IN ('4902', '4914', '4907', '4904', '4906', '4933', '4934', '4935', '4946', '4947', '4948') 
  AND FUNCTION = 10 
  AND VTYPE in (10,50)
  AND SERV_ID != 102010
  AND FYEAR >= (SELECT 
				FYEAR - 1
 				FROM "FIG_DS_SCHEMA"."FIG.FIGR_OVERHAUL::FIG_CTL_TBL.DASHBOARD"
				WHERE VAL_PUB = 'Publish'
				AND DASHBOARD_NAME = 'Financial Summary')
GROUP By
		 FUNCTION,
		 FUNCTION_DESC,
		 SRVC_LN_GRP,
		 SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC,
		 SERV_ID,
		 SRVC_LN_DESC,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER 
			ELSE FIRM_ID 
		 END,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER_DESC 
			ELSE FIRM_DESC 
		 END,
	     GEOGRAPHY,
	     GEOGRAPHY_DESC,
		 VTYPE,
		 VALUE_TYPE_DESC,
		 FYEAR,  
		 FPER,
		 FPER_DESC,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER_DESC,
		 ACCOUNT_ID,
		 ACCOUNT_DESC
),
----------------------------------------
--  headcount_data
----------------------------------------
headcount_data as
(
select
   FUNCTION  as Business_ID
  ,FUNCTION_DESC  as Business_Description
  ,SRVC_LN_GRP  as Sub_Function_ID
  ,SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC   as Sub_Function_Description
  ,SERV_ID as  Service_Line_ID
  ,SRVC_LN_DESC  as Service_Line_Description
  ,FIRM_ID  as Geography_ID
  ,FIRM_DESC  as  Geography_Description  
  ,GEOGRAPHY as Member_Firm
  ,GEOGRAPHY_DESC as Member_Firm_Description
  ,VTYPE as Value_Type
  ,VALUE_TYPE_DESC as Value_Type_Desc
  ,FYEAR  as Fiscal_Year
  ,FPER as Fiscal_Period
  ,FPER_DESC as Fiscal_Period_DESC
  ,CASE
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4902' THEN 'Equity Partner'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4904' THEN 'Salaried Partner'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4906' THEN NULL
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4907' THEN 'Equity Partner'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4914' THEN 'Equity Partner'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4933' THEN 'Director'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4934' THEN 'Senior Manager'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4935' THEN 'Manager'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4946' THEN 'Senior Staff'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4947' THEN 'Staff'
		WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4948' THEN 'Analyst/Junior Staff'
  END as Levels
--  ,'HeadCount' as Measure_Type
  ,NULL as HR_Quantity
  ,QNTY AS HC_Quantity

  from headcount_HANA 
),
-----------------------------------------
-- client_service_headcounts_Hana
-----------------------------------------
client_service_headcounts_Hana AS
(
SELECT 
		 FUNCTION,
		 FUNCTION_DESC,
		 SRVC_LN_GRP,
		 SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC,
		 SERV_ID,
		 SRVC_LN_DESC,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER 
			ELSE FIRM_ID 
		 END AS FIRM_ID,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER_DESC 
			ELSE FIRM_DESC 
		 END AS FIRM_DESC,
	     GEOGRAPHY,
	     GEOGRAPHY_DESC,
		 VTYPE,
		 VALUE_TYPE_DESC,
		 FYEAR,  
		 FPER,
		 FPER_DESC,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER_DESC,
		 ACCOUNT_ID,
		 ACCOUNT_DESC,
 		 sum(QNTY) AS QNTY  
 FROM "_SYS_BIC"."FIG.REPORTING.BI/CV_PL_RECON_RC" 
  ('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_REP_CUR$$', 'USD'),
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_VAL_PUB_INP$$', 'Validation'),
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_EXCHANGE_TYPE$$', 'F'),  
   'PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_DB_IND$$', 'KA')) as a
 JOIN "_SYS_BIC"."FIG.SHARED_OBJECTS/CV_DIM_VALUE_TYPE" as b
 on B.VALUE_TYPE = A.VTYPE
-- ACCOUNT IDS FOR HEADCOUNTS DATA
  WHERE ACCOUNT_ID IN ('4902', '4914', '4907', '4904', '4906', '4933', '4934', '4935', '4946', '4947', '4948')
  AND FUNCTION = 10 
  AND VTYPE in (10,50)
  AND SERV_ID != 102010
  AND FYEAR >= (SELECT 
				FYEAR - 1
 				FROM "FIG_DS_SCHEMA"."FIG.FIGR_OVERHAUL::FIG_CTL_TBL.DASHBOARD"
				WHERE VAL_PUB = 'Publish'
				AND DASHBOARD_NAME = 'Financial Summary')
GROUP By
		 FUNCTION,
		 FUNCTION_DESC,
		 SRVC_LN_GRP,
		 SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC,
		 SERV_ID,
		 SRVC_LN_DESC,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER 
			ELSE FIRM_ID 
		 END,
		 CASE 
		    WHEN SUB_CLUSTER IS NOT NULL 
			THEN SUB_CLUSTER_DESC 
			ELSE FIRM_DESC 
		 END,
	     GEOGRAPHY,
	     GEOGRAPHY_DESC,
		 VTYPE,
		 VALUE_TYPE_DESC,
		 FYEAR,  
		 FPER,
		 FPER_DESC,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER,
		 FISCAL_YEAR_PER_DESC,
		 ACCOUNT_ID,
		 ACCOUNT_DESC
),
----------------------------------------
-- client_service_headcounts
----------------------------------------
client_service_headcounts as
(
select
   FUNCTION  as Business_ID
  ,FUNCTION_DESC  as Business_Description
  ,SRVC_LN_GRP  as Sub_Function_ID
  ,SRV_LN_GRP_ID_DESC   as Sub_Function_Description
  ,SERV_ID as  Service_Line_ID
  ,SRVC_LN_DESC  as Service_Line_Description
  ,FIRM_ID  as Geography_ID
  ,FIRM_DESC  as  Geography_Description  
  ,GEOGRAPHY as Member_Firm
  ,GEOGRAPHY_DESC as Member_Firm_Description
  ,VTYPE as Value_Type
  ,VALUE_TYPE_DESC as Value_Type_Desc
  ,FYEAR  as Fiscal_Year
  ,FPER as Fiscal_Period
  ,FPER_DESC as Fiscal_Period_DESC
  ,CASE
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4902' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4904' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4906' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4907' THEN NULL
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4914' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4933' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4934' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4935' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4946' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4947' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
	WHEN ACCOUNT_ID='4948' THEN 'Client Service Headcounts'
  END as Levels
--  ,'HeadCount' as Measure_Type
  ,NULL as HR_Quantity
  ,QNTY AS HC_Quantity

  from client_service_headcounts_Hana
),
-------------------------------------
-- blended
-------------------------------------
blended as (
select 
	*
from hours_data
union ALL
select 
	*
from headcount_data
union ALL
select 
	*
from client_service_headcounts
),
-------------------------------------
--  processed
-------------------------------------
processed as (
select
   Business_ID
  ,Business_Description
  ,Sub_Function_ID
  ,Sub_Function_Description
  ,Service_Line_ID
  ,Service_Line_Description
  ,Geography_ID
  ,Geography_Description  
  ,Member_Firm
  ,Member_Firm_Description
  ,Value_Type
  ,Value_Type_Desc
  ,Fiscal_Year
  ,Fiscal_Period
  ,Fiscal_Period_DESC
  ,Levels
  ,	CASE 
		WHEN Levels='Analyst/Junior Staff' THEN 1
	    WHEN Levels='Director' THEN 2
		WHEN Levels='Equity Partner' THEN 3
		WHEN Levels='Manager' THEN 4
		WHEN Levels='Partner' THEN 5
		WHEN Levels='Salaried Partner' THEN 6
		WHEN Levels='Senior Manager' THEN 7
		WHEN Levels='Senior Staff' THEN 8
		WHEN Levels='Staff' THEN 9
		WHEN Levels='Client Service Headcounts' THEN 10
	END AS col_order
  ,SUM(HR_Quantity) as Hours 
  ,SUM(HC_Quantity) as Headcounts
from blended
group by   Business_ID
  ,Business_Description
  ,Sub_Function_ID
  ,Sub_Function_Description
  ,Service_Line_ID
  ,Service_Line_Description
  ,Geography_ID
  ,Geography_Description  
  ,Member_Firm
  ,Member_Firm_Description
  ,Value_Type
  ,Value_Type_Desc
  ,Fiscal_Year
  ,Fiscal_Period
  ,Fiscal_Period_DESC
  ,Levels
)
------------------------------
-- Main 
------------------------------
select 
   Business_ID
  ,Business_Description
  ,Sub_Function_ID
  ,Sub_Function_Description
  ,Service_Line_ID
  ,Service_Line_Description
  ,Geography_ID
  ,Geography_Description  
  ,Member_Firm
  ,Member_Firm_Description
  ,Value_Type
  ,Value_Type_Desc
  ,Fiscal_Year
  ,Fiscal_Period
  ,Fiscal_Period_DESC
  ,CASE
	WHEN Levels='Client Service Headcounts' THEN 'Total Client Service Headcounts'
	ELSE Levels
  END as Levels
  ,Hours 
  ,Headcounts
from processed
where Levels is not NULL
and Fiscal_Year >= 2022
order by   Business_ID
  ,Business_Description
  ,Sub_Function_ID
  ,Sub_Function_Description
  ,Service_Line_ID
  ,Service_Line_Description
  ,Geography_ID
  ,Geography_Description  
  ,Member_Firm
  ,Member_Firm_Description
  ,Value_Type
  ,Value_Type_Desc
  ,Fiscal_Year
  ,Fiscal_Period
  ,Fiscal_Period_DESC
  ,col_order

/*
select 
	DISTINCT
		Fiscal_Year,
		Member_Firm_ID,
		Member_firms_Description
from processed
order by 1, 3
*/
